properties.areaDesc: St Joseph to South Haven MI; Pentwater to Manistee MI; Grand Haven to Whitehall MI; South Haven to Holland MI; Holland to Grand Haven MI; Whitehall to Pentwater MI
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 8 at 3:24PM EST until January 9 at 11:00PM EST by NWS Grand Rapids MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southeast winds increasing to 20 to 30 knots with gusts
up to 40 knots and waves building to 6 to 9 feet Thursday
afternoon. Winds will become southerly Thursday afternoon.

* WHERE...St Joseph to Manistee.

* WHEN...From 7 AM to 11 PM EST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 11 PM EST THURSDAY
